trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that corresponds to the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpContextBinding" /> binding.
The XML element that corresponds to the `NetTcpContextBindingElement` can be used in the application configuration file under the `system.serviceModel/bindings/netTcpContextBinding` node.
trans-unit.target: 可以在应用程序配置文件中的 `NetTcpContextBindingElement` 节点下使用与 `system.serviceModel/bindings/netTcpContextBinding` 相对应的 XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetTcpContextBindingElement" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetTcpContextBindingElement" /> class.
The configuration name of the binding.
The value should be unique because it is used as identification for the binding.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetTcpContextBindingElement" /> class with the specified configuration name.
<paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
A configuration element with the specified <paramref name="name" /> does not exist.
Gets the CLR type of the standard binding associated with the configuration element <see langword="System.ServiceModel.NetTcpContextBinding" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that specifies the CLR type of the standard binding associated with the configuration element <see langword="System.ServiceModel.NetTcpContextBinding" />
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，指定与配置元素 <see langword="System.ServiceModel.NetTcpContextBinding" /> 关联的标准绑定的 CLR 类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the client callback address for the binding element.
Returns <see cref="T:System.Uri" />, which contains the client callback address..
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />，其中包含客户端回调地址。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether context management is enabled.
<see langword="true" /> if context management is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果已启用上下文管理;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the desired protection level of the SOAP header used to propagate the context information.
The default value is <see langword="ProtectionLevel.Sign" />.
A valid <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> value.
The binding that contains the content and context protection level used to initialize the class.
Initializes this binding configuration element based on the configuration of the specified binding.
The binding object supplied must be of type <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpContextBinding" />.
The binding to be applied.
Applies the configuration of this configuration element to the specified binding instance.
The binding instance supplied must be of type <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpContextBinding" />.

Gets a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> instance that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> objects that can be attributes or <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> objects of this configuration element.

A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> instance that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> objects that can be attributes or <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> 实例，该实例包含一个 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> 对象集合，这些对象可以是此配置元素的属性或 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetTcpContextBindingElement.ContextProtectionLevel%2A> property is also contained in this property collection.
trans-unit.target: 此属性集合中还包含 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetTcpContextBindingElement.ContextProtectionLevel%2A> 属性。
